category: news
title: "Smart telescope brings night sky to detailed life for under $1000"
excerpt: "In the past the procedure of finding an object in the night sky has been made much easier with the advent of computer guided telescopes, a feature available to astronomer buffs for over 20 years. The price of computer aided instruments has fallen significantly due to low-cost electronics and the mass production of quality optics, mainly from China."
